properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Freeport to Matagorda Ship Channel TX out 20 NM; Waters from Freeport to Matagorda Ship Channel TX from 20 to 60 NM; Waters from High Island to Freeport TX from 20 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 29 at 3:13PM CST until March 1 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Houston/Galveston TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds increasing to 15 to 25 kt and seas building
to 5 to 7 feet nearshore and 6 to 8 feet offshore.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Freeport to Matagorda Ship Channel
TX out 20 NM, Waters from Freeport to Matagorda Ship Channel
TX from 20 to 60 NM and Waters from High Island to Freeport TX
from 20 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...Until 6 PM CST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller vessels,
should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST SUNDAY
